definitions.definition: Any of various plants , of the genus Croton , that yield croton oil .
A tropical evergreen shrub , Codiaeum variegatum , having glossy foliage, cultivated as a houseplant .

main_definition: Any of various plants , of the genus Croton , that yield croton oil .
secondary_definitions: A tropical evergreen shrub , Codiaeum variegatum , having glossy foliage, cultivated as a houseplant .
